subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In the span of two dizzying days, Omar Minaya signed Francisco Rodríguez to a three-year, $37 million deal, and acquired J. J. Putz in a three-team, 12-player trade.
snippet: In the span of two dizzying days, Omar Minaya signed Francisco Rodríguez to a three-year, $37 million deal, and acquired J. J. Putz in a three-team, 12-player trade.
